item.title: Imprint
item.description: Provider Identification The following provides mandatory data concerning the provider of this Website, obligations with regard to data protection, as well as other important legal references involving the Website of the Max Planck Institut für Informatik as required by German law. Provider The provider of this Website within the legal meaning of the term is the registered association Max Planck Society for the Advancement of Science. Address Max-Planck-Gesellschaft zur Förderung der Wissenschaften e.

item.title: About
item.description: Partners Hochschule Nordhausen (HSN) The Hochschule Nordhausen - University of Applied Sciences (HSN) is a young, modern university of applied sciences. Since being founded in 1997 and admitting its first students in 1998, the university has developed into a future-oriented educational establishment: State-of-the-art technologies, professors and lecturers with practical experience plus modern degree courses which meet the requirements of the future labour market guarantee a high standard of scientific training.

item.title: Publications Intro
item.description: This article offers a sample of basic Markdown syntax that can be used in Hugo content files, also it shows whether basic HTML elements are decorated with CSS in a Hugo theme.
